title: NO decision to increase public sector salaries – PM Office
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Office of the Prime Minister of Sri Lanka said that the Prime Minister has NOT made a decision to increase the salaries of the public sector.

In a statement the Media Division for the Prime Minister said the upcoming interim relief budget will cut down provisions for all ministries except for the Health and Education Sectors, but will be awarded relief.
India, Japan to work together to help Sri Lanka during crisis
Fake Passport : Shashi Weerawansa sentenced to two years in prison
